title: Frankolala
author: Frankolala
content: Abeg my people, I know say right now everybody dey focus and dey prepare towards the bull and I know say so many of us get big expectations for the bull run because we don plan to sell part of our investment or if not all. Wetin be the plan wey you get for the next bear market after the bull run, and wetin you think say be the best advice for us wey never experience the bull run and the bear market after the bull run for us to do, so that we no go come dey regret some of our actions later when the bull run don pass.Â I need to know because when e good make man prepare for the two side of the market so that you go take opportunity of the market. E get any other way wey person go fit do apart from to start to buy at the dip again and hodli till the next bull run again.

comments.author: Jascrypt
comments.body: Na to learn how to buy dip like you talk am but you fit try futures if you get the skills and also make you the stake some token wey you wan hodl for a long time.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Frankolala on October 06, 2023, 06:07:10 PMI need to know because when e good make man prepare for the two side of the market so that you go take opportunity of the market. E get any other way wey person go fit do apart from to start to buy at the dip again and hodli till the next bull run again. If you make money from the bullrun, you can invest in land or real estate in general. Buying like a plot of land at some locations is not that costly. But if you are going into something like this, make sure you have all the legal documents. If you can not do it yourself, get your lawyer to help you in the right way.If you invested in altcoins, it is advisable to convert the altcoins if you have made money very well from them. For bitcoin, you may not decided to convert all. Altcoins are very volatile and their fall can be very painful as they can make your money become worthless.
